name: Destruction Imminent
description:
SUBMISSION FOR THE WOWIE GAME JAM 4.0

FIXED WEB BUILD: https://fries09.itch.io/destruction-imminent-fixed-build

Fair bit of warning: Game is hard. I also lost motivation so it is really short.

Destruction Imminent is a short but sweet genre hopper set in the distant future where AI is rude apparently. It starts off with simple puzzles, but overtime becomes more complex and difficult. One minute it may be similar to The Worlds Hardest Game, but the next minute, it could be a top down shooter.
